title: Weird bug while gifting snowball icons
body: "ERROR_CREATING_FFG_ACCOUNT_NICKNAME" I'm getting this error when I try to gift one of my friends the new snowball icon, but I can gift my other friends just fine, any ideas?

replies.body:
Hey yhsalF,

Thanks for the report! I haven't heard of this particular error. I'll shoot this over to the team who works on this!
I'm getting this same error, as well as a new friend I just tried to make.  We're positing it's because we're new friends?
I looked into this, and it looks like you may not have been friends for at least 24 hours, which is the minimum amount of time you need to be friends in order to gift.

> Snowballs: For when honor isn't enough, but you ain't dropping RP on that random person.  

Pretty much, haha. 

Unfortunately, we aren't able to change the restrictions on this one. :c

Hi im sorry for bugging you but are you sure its 1 day? my friend who i made today tried to gift me a skin and came up with this nickname thing, im worried because he spent money and cant gift it :(

It should be 24 hours from the time you befriended each other. If you're having issues still, I would suggest shooting a ticket over to [player support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=4584). They'll be able to help out!
Your friend_ may_ have reached their gifting limit for the day - we'll look into it!
